name: RetroWave
description: RetroWave is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, RetroWave stands out in any crowd. Its retro console buttons add a nostalgic touch, reminding everyone of the golden age of electronics. Equipped with sturdy foundry arms and legs, RetroWave is built to withstand any challenge. Its laser screen provides a clear and precise display of information, making it an excellent companion for any technical task.
